description:
We strive to be Your Future, Your Solution to accelerate your career!

Contact Megan Wilcox at mwilcox@saigepartners.com to learn more about this opportunity!

Senior Sales Manager - Southeast Region

Job Overview: As a Senior Sales Manager, you will play a pivotal role in advancing the growth and profitability. Your responsibilities will include identifying and securing new business opportunities, meeting sales targets, and employing consultative selling techniques to educate customers about their industry and offer tailored solutions.

This is a Direct Hire role.

What you will be doing as a Senior Sales Manager - Southeast …
• New Business Development
• Sales Cycle Management
• Relationship Management
• Communication
• Market Analysis and Competitor Research
• Sales Target Achievement
• Networking
• Ownership

Skills you ideally bring to the table as a Senior Sales Manager - Southeast …
• Proven track record of success in transportation sales with a minimum of [3] years of sales experience.
• Deep understanding of the transportation industry, including knowledge of various modes of transportation, logistics, and supply chain management.
• Strong prospecting and lead generation skills.
• Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
• Results-oriented mindset with a focus on meeting or exceeding sales targets.

Learn more about Saige Partners on Facebook or LinkedIn.

Saige Partners, one of the fastest growing technology and talent companies in the Midwest, believes in people with a passion to help them succeed. We are in the business of helping professionals Build Careers, Not Jobs. Saige Partners believes employees are the most valuable asset to building a thriving and successful company culture. Contact us to learn more about the opportunity below or check out other opportunities at https://careers.saigepartners.com/.
